reviews.sentence: Excellent price in great South Beach Location. Will absolutely stay here again. My girlfriend and I chose this hotel based on it is location and affordable price for getaway vacation without the kids. It was perfect for a risque south beach vacation. We were not expecting to spend a lot of time in our hotel room so we did not want to spend too much on a room. We were pleasantly surprised with the accommodations and quality of the staff. The staff exceeded our expectations very nice welcoming and accommodating. From the receptionists to the bellmen everyone was great. The location is perfect it sits between one of the best Cuban restaurants I have ever eaten at the coolest South American tapas restaurant and Bar and the beach. Everything in this hotel has been updated and has a great authentic South Beach Miami boutique vibe. If you want to eat great food go to the beach shop party and explore South Beach then this hotel is an excellent choice. Everything was of course clean and well kept and the decor in the rooms and throughout the hotel are fantastic. Spend more cash enjoying South Beach and stay at this awesome boutique hotel.

Excellent price in great South Beach Location. Will absolutely stay here again. My girlfriend and I chose this hotel based on it is location and affordable price for getaway vacation without the kids. It was perfect for a risque south beach vacation. We were not expecting to spend a lot of time in our hotel room so we did not want to spend too much on a room. We were pleasantly surprised with the accommodations and quality of the staff. The staff exceeded our expectations very nice welcoming and accommodating. From the receptionists to the bellmen everyone was great. The location is perfect it sits between one of the best Cuban restaurants I have ever eaten at the coolest South American tapas restaurant and Bar and the beach. Everything in this hotel has been updated and has a great authentic South Beach Miami boutique vibe. If you want to eat great food go to the beach shop party and explore South Beach then this hotel is an excellent choice. Everything was of course clean and well kept and the decor in the rooms and throughout the hotel are fantastic. Spend more cash enjoying South Beach and stay at this awesome boutique hotel.

Clinton. It is a great hotel the room was clean free happy hour the staff was more than helpful 10 the only thing is add 20 for valet per 24 hours it is extra no parking available for blocks we paid park your car yourself and walk or cab around.

Great location minimal amentities. I loved the location of the hotel especially for its price. It was not a great five star hotel but it was nice enough. The complimentary breakfast and happy hour are both lame and unnecessary. We tried them each once and did not go back. The shuttle service is very convenient though as is the towel rental. It was fine for our purposes and you really can not beat the location. The area is so walkable and convenient to everything. The one thing I really did not like was that the walls of the hotel are very thin. We went to sleep with our TV blaring several nights because the music in the bar was so loud and you can hear exactly what your neighbors are saying at times. Location. Nice staff. Beach bars restaurants shopping. Get sound machines for each of the rooms.
Great location. Great hotel good location for the price and free airport shuttle.

Great location mediocore quality. First time in South Beach. Neighborhood was a little run down. Location to the South Beach strip was fantastic middle of the strip beach was a two block walk. Hotel pictures are outdated. The hotel is run down and nothing special. Rooms were clean and staff was very accommodating. Not a fancy hotel by any means. Bed was comfortable but low quality. We were satisfied with the stay for the money felt the cost justified the level of quality.
south beach hotel. Decent hotel with good price and great location in the heart of South Beach. Walking distance to everything in South Beach.

helpful staff clean room great location. SWF in South Beach on business. Front desk concierge and valet were all very helpful. I checked in early with no hassle checked out late on my last day. My room was clean and the cleaning ladies were very pleasant and helpful – even helped me carry bags when I was coming and leaving. The location is perfect – close to shopping restaurants and beach. I would recommend this for a casual visit and I would bring my teenagers. Very good value for the price. For a super romantic getaway I would recommend one of the more upscale hotels. But for anything else I will definitely be back.
Pretty nice hotel like 2 blocks away from Ocean Dr Nice hotel close to the beach I just think is a Lil too expensive for what you get but I will go back definitely.

A trade off. The room was not as pictured the ac would not shut off automatically unles switch is turned to off. Room view was a wall. room phone and radio did not work not to mention Washington ave is totally different at night. Good points the price was right and the staff allowed us to check in early and valet park early and that out weighted the negative aspects for us. online Very convenient update hotel and pool.

My family and friends stayed at Clinton hotel on April 10 of 2015. The ONLY reason this hotel is alive because it is a couple of blocks from the south beach and let me shed some lights here. Upon entry dirt on carpets corridors dust tumbleweed in every corner smell of piss next to ice machine out of orderleather sofa in lounge is saturated with sweat and black what looks like a tar reception person barely spoke English extremely rude. Room carpet looked like nobody bothered to vacuum for a month we asked to switch rooms four times and every single room was in the same shape finally we had to have someone come in and vacuum againtoilet seat still had piss spots even though sign said. desinfectedTV mount crooked some wired hanging off with some other gadgets attached to it. The pool or perhaps a hole 10 by 15 in middle with dark green water somebodys passed out at the pool with legs hanging in the water. A bar next to the pool is the same as everything else greasy arms on chairs food particals and pizza crust in the corner stentch of spilled liquor is the air. Happy hour consist of drinks for free from the plastic bottles only so we decided not to have a happy hour in that bar. Wrote a few complaints to the management but still waiting for a response. Stay the hell away from this hotel I do not care how cheap you wana get btw rooms cost was 240 per night.

Let me just start of by saying if I could give this hotel 0 stars I would. Hell they deserve negative stars for what they put me through. I called 2 days prior to my stay to check to see if my reservation was set they could not find me in the system and the girl who answered my phone was rude. When I arrived to the hotel there was no clear direction of where to park for valet and when I went to check in the girls at the front desk did not greet me or my party they were rude and they were about to charge me twice for the room that I already paid for. I told them that the charges need to be dropped because I paid and they said yes definitely. So we got 2 rooms that were on the same floor but different halls I asked if they had rooms near each other and their answer was OH WE ARE COMPLETELY BOOKED. So we get into our rooms and the AC did not work in one so the guy called down and they switched our second room to the room across the hall from the first room. Completely booked. Yeah anyway. Hotel was not all that clean shower floor was gross the beds were disgusting and this hotel looks NOTHING like the pictures. So come time to check out I sent my boyfriend to check out his room first. They ended up charging my card an extra 300. After I told them I already paid. They told me it was too late to reverse the charges and I would have to call back tomorrow because the manager is not there. I asked if I could leave my number and they said the manager will not even call you back. What kind of place is this. A manager will not even call back for a mistake made by their employees. Anyway I asked for my cars to be brought around. 2 cars came in 10 minutes. No problem. My car took 45min1hr just to come around. The valet guy started to argue with us when we asked why it took so long. I was so pissed off at the terrible service that I just got in my car and left. When I got home I found that the stupid valet guys DENTED my car Tore my fender liner off and tried to repair it and left over 10 scratches on my front left panel. When I called back the guys were rude and denied that they did anything. So now I am left with a car to fix thanks to these morons. Oh and also I still have that 300 charge on my credit card. I call back every day and they say that they refunded it. Ha. My bank will be taking care of this one for me. DO NOT STAY HERE. IT IS TERRIBLE. Yes it may be cheap and by the beach but trust me pay an extra 50 and stay elsewhere. They do not care about their guests. they are horrible. They yelled at me over the phone and hung up multiple times when I tried to call. They do not take responsibility for their actions and pass the blame onto someone else. AVOID AVOID AVOID at ALL COSTS. Worst hotel experience ever. I had rather stay at a motel 6 than this place.

Dirty over priced old spring breaker hotel. The location because I needed to be close to the 17th st convention center for work but I would have been better off staying at a youth hostel. The room was dirty the carpet was very dusty it was very dirty all over the floor the sheets had a stain. We asked them to please clean the room but they did not do anything about it. The halls of the hotel look like a bad and dirty spring break movie. Also they forgot every day for 3 days to put towels in the room so every time you wanted to shower you had to wait 10 mins for towels to come. Lastly I asked them on check out day to not charge everything on one card they said no problem. When I went to check out it took 30 mins and it was a slow and painful process dealing with a receptionist with attitude.

Close to the beach. Fast check in however the bathroom had a bad smell. They have hidden fees which is very deceptive. The breakfast is not continental because you pay for it out of an amenity fee they charge. There is s 500 charge per night during your stay in which they release when you check out. This is not a five star hotel so the charges do not suit the hotel. The staff was very nice however I would not stay at this hotel again.

Was OK. The rooms and bathrooms were a decent size and clean and the air conditioning very cold. The hotel staff was very pleasant. Aside from that the hotel does not offer much else in regard to facilities or amenities. The free breakfast was very no frills the pool area was small and dingy looking nothing even close to how nice the online photos look. Washington Avenue is very busy and if your rooms happen to face Washington you will hear cars trucks buses etc. all through the night and early mornings. For what we needed the hotel was OK and not sure how this was even rated 34 on Expedia.

mattress was about 20 years old. sheets did not fit bed or pillows. room was archaic and the carpeting in the hallway was not vacuumed in the 2 ½ days we were there. pool was half filled with water. pictures are incredibly deceiving. i was charged more than i have ever spent for a hotel including 5 star 4 seasons etc and had a horrible stay. it was close to the beach. that is the only thing i liked. location was awful. the area was extremely sketchy during the evening hours. a lot of homeless people and drug addicts near by. do not sell the rooms at the price i paid. never again.

The DECEPTION. I will NEVER stay here or recommend this hotel to anyone. First off The place looks NOTHING like the picture. The pool has no water the lobby is unkept dingy and the rooms smell old. For the amount of money you pay here you can stay at a nice chain hotel for a week. we were only there 4 nights. housekeeping came one time during our stay. room lighting is dim and you ca nt even look outside the windows. Do yourself a favor and go anywhere else. The pictures online which I am certain were taken when they first opened. everything.

Upset diapointed. This hotel is terrible. The pictures definitely lie to you. The hotel was filthy there where gnats flying around all through my room the whole weekend. Please read the reviews. I learned the hard way stayed here anyway. Do your safe a favor pay more for something you will feel comfortable staying in. They lie about all the accommodations as far as bath robs breakfast you name it. The breakfast was dry bagels toast cereal. None of the items we where told. Never stay here again is all I am going to say. do not do it. read the reviews they are not lying.

It was okay. I liked the location of the hotel. It was a block and a half from everything entertainment restaurants bars stores etc. The customer service was great. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Whenever I asked for something it was done immediately. The hotel was clean. The pictures of the hotel displayed on Booking is not how it looks in person. Also on Booking it stated that the hotel provided waffles eggs bacon etc. for the continental breakfast. that is was not true. They provided cereal coffee juice and bagels. The rooms look nothing like the pictures online. The rooms appeared bigger online but they were small. There was no wifi in the hotel at all. There were no refrigerators in the room so you could not keep drinks and food cold. Also the hotel is in the middle of renevations so they were painting the elevator during our stay. Our shower broke and they had to come fix it. I felt like I over paid for what I got.

We had a good stay. Location was just ok. Close to the beach but a lot of run down stores in the area. Hotel was great just after renovation. Should consider repainting the elevator lighter color n add some lighting. Nice aroma in the lobby spacious bathroom n shower in the room. 90 of employees speak Spanish only and showed no effort to try to understand. Our TV did not work no one came to fix it. Front desk attendant brought second remote and we somehow managed between two remotes but spent a couple of late night hours to get it working. Continental breakfast is ok if you are happy with bagels muffins or cereal. No gluten free options so bring your own or eat out. Notwithstanding the above cleanliness is my number 1 priority and Price was good too so we left happy. Overall we enjoyed our stay.
somewhat satisfied. Good location. Place needs to be upgraded very old but good hotel for the price.

You get what you pay for. Clinton hotel is a good hotel if you do not want to stay at these huge resorts that cost a lot of money. The rooms are descent the breakfast is okay and the staff is really good and service minded. It is totally worth the expense. its located in the perfect area in South beach close to everything but still not on crazy ocean drive. You get what you pay for and its worth the money. The staff and the manager was really helpful when we had complains about the plugs not working and fridge was leaking.

It was ok. I loved the. was so small the pool was DIRTY AND VERY SMALL. They did nt really accommodate for late check outs they charge you for every little thing. And i could nt play music in my I dislike that the.

Close to Ocean Drice and the beach. I enjoyed my experience at this hotel. The staff was amazing. The room clean and everything worked. The only thing I would change is the size of the hotel pool was small. Besides that everything was great.
Comfortable hotel. An excellent stay thank you for providing a most comfortable hotel. Pool was good. Beach umbrella was at an extre 20 charge. Breakfast good to be included a good start to the day.

This was my first time staying at this hotel and I must say it is a great value for the price. The location is near everything you need yet far enough away from the strip that you can enjoy a peaceful and comfortable nights rest. The staff were informative attentive and personable. The facility is clean and comfortable and they make sure that you have everything you need right down to the mini bar and snacks available in the room although convenience stores are less than a block away. The continental breakfast and the beach chairs are a definite plus. The only complaint I have about my stay is that there were no washcloths. Luckily I had brought my own from home but out of the 3 nights I stayed only 1 washcloth was provided on the first night and housekeeping took that the next day when they cleaned the room and we never received another one for the remainder of our stay even though we requested it. We were told that they would be available the next morning but we still never received any. Overall though I recommend this hotel and will definitely stay there again.

Nice location and no more than that. This hotel is rated 4 stars on Expedia but it must be wrong. At most a rating of 3 stars is more suitable. The bath room smelled urin. The breakfast was way too poor with breads bagels Nutela Philadelphia cheese apple jam cornflakes tea coffee orange juice and some apples bananas. that is all. The breakfast room was too small only 6 tables with four chairs each. Are you lucky you will find a table available. People lined in queue in the doorway waiting for a table. The pool was small. We never used it since we preferred the beach. Location Bath room toilet breakfast and breakfast hall must be heavily upgraded in order to have the current rating of 4 stars.
Charming hotel and staff for a great price. Only reason we are not giving 5 stars is the free breakfast consists of basically bread and cereal. Room was very clean and would stay here again.

honestly not that great smallest pool i ve ever seen some of the sheets they gave us had holes in them and housekeeping kept taking our wash clothes and not replacing them the minibar they try to scam you with takes up half your space just very espensive for what you get only good thing is convenient and very good location.

Overall my stay at the Clinton was good dispute the bad breakfast i enjoyed my room and my balcony. I enjoyed the pool side that had a bar a few steps away where servers would come serve you while you relax and unwind near the pool I feel like the hotel can upgrade there complementary breakfast a littler more we had to pay for things like eggs and even jam. The complementary breakfast was n’t really that many options or great to me at all. I did n’t enjoy the food at all.

1 Our reservation was for a room with two beds. We checked in at 10 pm because of flight issues. We could not get two beds in the room and had to accept having one bed. 2 The breakfast is not what we expected it was in a next door Lemonade restaurant. One item to choose from a menu with few choices. We were handed another menu with good breakfast choices the catch you have to pay to order from that menu. That s not my understanding of breakfast included in the price. The coffee that they served with breakfast was one of the worst that I had in my life. It looks as if it was made from instant coffee.
Absolutely wonderful location. Very close to beach and bars and restaurants. Reasonable price and good happy hour at the attached restaurant.
Amazing hotel good price central location lovely rooms. Will be back.
